comments: Ball (CHI) maintains a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact from Randle (NYK) in the post.
Barrett (NYK) makes contact with LaVine's (CHI) arm that affects his driving shot attempt.
Randle (NYK) is already in LaVine's (CHI) path and is firming up when contact occurs.
Ball (CHI) brings his arm slightly forward and marginal contact occurs with Randle's (NYK) side as Randle loses the ball on his own.
DeRozan (CHI) applies a stayed forearm to Barrett's (NYK) side and DeRozan removes his arm as Barrett begins his upward shooting motion.
Ball (CHI) briefly grasps Randle's (NYK) arm and he releases Randle as he reaches for the rebound.  Both players then briefly engage and disengage.
Randle (NYK) kicks the ball away from Ball (CHI) as they attempt to secure the loose ball.
Vucevic (CHI) is already in Fournier's (NYK) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Robinson (NYK) turns into DeRozan's (CHI) body and delivers contact as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Vucevic (CHI)  makes marginal contact with Robinson (NYK) as they come together at the same spot on the perimeter.  The contact does not affect Robinson's FOM.
Vucevic (CHI) cleanly deflects the ball away from Walker (NYK) during his drive.
Vucevic (CHI) is the last player to touch the ball and possession is correctly awarded to New York.
Robinson (NYK) establishes a wide screening position in LaVine's (CHI) path, and contact occurs to Robinson's leg.
LaVine (CHI) turns into Fournier's (NYK) lower body and initiates contact that affects Fournier's follow through.
Ball (CHI) briefly grasps Randle's (NYK) arm and he releases Randle's arm as he moves for the rebound.
Caruso (CHI) moves forward into Walker's (NYK) space and delivers contact as Walker elevates for his shot.
Vucevic (CHI) briefly grasps Randle's (NYK) arm during rebounding.
Vucevic (CHI) is already in Barrett's (NYK) path when contact occurs and he absorbs the contact.
LaVine (CHI) commits a take foul on Walker (NYK).
DeRozan (CHI) cleanly deflects the ball away from Randle (NYK).
DeRozan (CHI) steps out of bounds while in possession of the ball.  Possession is correctly awarded to New York.
LaVine (CHI) commits a take foul on Randle (NYK).
Robinson (NYK) legally contests DeRozan's (CHI) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Randle (NYK) extends his arm away from his body and marginal contact occurs with Ball (CHI) as Ball moves towards the basket.  Ball's reaction is not consistent with the level of contact.
